title: DynamoDB Stream to AWS Lambda with Step Function Event Enrichment
description: This pattern triggers a Lambda function from a DynamoDB Stream with Step functions enrichment in between them using EventBridge Pipes.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: DynamoDB Streams events are sent to Step Function workflow, the workflow enriches the event and forwards them onto the Lambda function
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Sayan Moitra
authors.bio: Sayan is a Solutions Architect at Amazon Web Services based in India.
